note.p: Birth: Higher Broughton, near Salford, Lancashire, England (18 June 1886)
Career: Lecturer in Vertebrate Palaeontology, University College, London
AssocMaterial: NCUACS 42/4/93. Papers deposited in University College Library, London
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1974 vol 20 pp 483-504, plate, by F R Parrington and T S Westoll
References: Anon, 'Visit of His Excellency the Soviet Ambassador, 19 November 1959' in NR 1959 vol 14 pp 160-162
